LANG_CHOOSE_GROUP_ADVICE: You are trying to change your language(not group)? Do that using /start in private chat
LANG_CHANGED: Ok, from now i will speak english 🇬🇧
LANG_CHANGED_GROUP: Ok, from now i will speak {lang} on this group
NEW_GROUP: Thanks for adding me to your group! • Don't forget to make me Admin of the group (see how), or i cant work correctly • Use /reload to verify that's all ok{owner}
PRESENTATION: 👋🏻 Hello {name}! @LibreGroupHelpBot is the free, open source and privacy respecting Bot alternative to Group Help to better manage your groups! 👉🏻Add me in a supergroup and set me as an Administrator to get me right into the action! ❓ What are the commands? Currently commands are in https://github.com/Sp3rick/GroupHelp/blob/main/documentation.md NOTE: bot is still in testing and may have bugs or unexpected crashes! If you are a JavaScript developer you can contribute on https://github.com/Sp3rick/GroupHelp
INFO: Libre Group Help runs under Nodejs and is an Open Source project that aims to offer a relaiable bot to manage your groups and be privacy respecting to it's users Bot version: {LGHVersion} Bot staff •@Sp3rick_hj, creator and first developer
SUPPORT_MESSAGE: 👉🏻 Send now a message with a request to the Staff. 💡The request has to be sent in one message only, other messages will be not received.
SUPPORT_SENT_CONFIRM: Message sent. We will reply as soon as possible.
SUPPORT_RECEIVED: 👤You received a message from the support, to respond reply this message
MISSING_PERMISSION:
👮🏼 You don't have the permission to perform this action.

💡Use /reload to update group admin list
SETTINGS_WHERE_OPEN: Where do you want to open the settings menu?
SETTINGS_SELECT: Select one of the settings you want edit.
SETTINGS_PRIVATE_ERROR: ⚠️ Please start me in private chat to use this function
SETUP_GUIDE: In order to set me up, use /settings or press the underlying button.
RULES_SETTING: 📜 Group's regulations From here you can set the group rules that will be shown with the command /rules.
COMMAND_PERMS_DESCRIPTION: 💻Commands permissions💻 From this menu you can configure basic commands permissions for your group 👥 = all 🤖 = all, in private chat 👮🏻 = admins 🥷 = admins, in private chat
CHANGE_RULES_ADV: 👉🏻 Use the buttons below to select what you are going to edit
SET_MESSAGE_ADV: 👉🏻 Send now the message you want to set. You can send it already formatted or use HTML
SET_MEDIA_ADV: 👉🏻Send now any media (photo, video, sticker, file) you want to set. You can type a caption.
SET_BUTTONS_ADV: 👉🏻Send now the list of buttons to insert on the inline keyboard, with texts and links, using this format: Text button - link.com Text button - @LibreGroupHelpBot • If you want to set 2 or more buttons on the same row separe them with &&. Example: Website - https://github.com/ && Channel - @username
MEDIA_INCORRECT: ⚠️ Media was not parsed properly. Try again.
PARSING_ERROR: ⚠️ Message was not parsed properly. Try again.
PARSING_ERROR_TEXT: ⚠️ Message was not parsed properly. Please be sure to send a text message without media or any addition.
BUTTONS_ROWS_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the limit of 14 rows. Try again.
BUTTONS_CULUMNS_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the limit of 8 culumns. Try again.
BUTTONS_TOTAL_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the limit of 92 buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_MISSING_LINK: ⚠️ You didn't set a link to one or more buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_NAME_LIMIT: ⚠️ You reached the name limit (64 characters) for one or more buttons. Try again.
BUTTONS_NAME_TOO_SHORT: ⚠️ You created one or more buttons without name. Try again.
BUTTONS_INVALID_LINK: ⚠️ A link for one or more buttons is invalid. Try again.
WELCOME_SETTING: 💬 Welcome Message From here you can set a welcome message sent when someone join the group.
W_SEND_EVERYTIME: Send the welcome message at every join of users in the group
W_SEND_ONCE: Send the welcome message only at the first join of the user in the group
ANTIFLOOD_DESCRIPTION:
From here you can set a punishment for those who send many messages in a short time.

Currently the antiflood is activated when {messages} messages are sent within {seconds} seconds.
ANTIFLOOD_PUNISHMENT: AntiFlood, user sent more than {number} messages in {time} seconds
WARNS_DESCRIPTION: ❗️ User warnings The warnings system allows you to give warnings to user for incorrect bahaivor in your group, before acutally punishing them. From this menu you can set: • The punishment to apply when warnings limit is hit • the maximum number of warns {punishmentText} Max Warns allowed: {limit}
ASK_WRITE: 📝 Send now a number to set it
ASK_PIN_NOTIFY: Do you want to send notification pinning this messages?
SEND_PUNISHMENT_DURATION: Send now the duration of the chosen punishment ({punishment})
STIME_DESCRIPTION: Minimum: {minimum} Maximum: {maximum} Format examples: 2 month 5 days 12 hour 6 minutes 30 second, 5d 1h Current duration: {time}
SNUM_TOOBIG: ⚠️ Your number is bigger than {number}. Try again.
SNUM_TOOSMALL: ⚠️ Your number is smaller than {number}. Try again.
SNUM_CB_TOOSMALL: ⚠️ This is smaller than minimum limit ({number}).
STIME_INVALID_INPUT: ⚠️ Your time is invalid. Try again.
PROMOTED_DESCRIPTION: Use buttons below to change admin permissions
TITLE_CHANGED_TO: admin title has been changed to
SEND_NEW_TITLE: Send now the new title to assign
TOO_LOW_LEVEL_SET_ROLE: ⚠️ You haven't permission to set this role, it's higher level than your
TOO_LOW_LEVEL_SET_USER: ⚠️ You can't change permissions to this user because he is higher level than you
INVALID_TARGET: ⚠️ Invalid target, please reply to an user message or enter a username, if known will be used
INVALID_TITLE:
⚠️ Invalid title, reply to an user with "/title customName" or identifier "/title @username customName"

Maximum 16 characters, emoji not allowed
Use /untitle to remove a title to an user
USELESS_ROLE: ⚠️ You can't set this role because user already has all it's permissions
USER_IS_IMMUNE: ⚠️ This user is immune and can't be punished, use /perms to see user permissions
MISSING_ROLE_PERM: ⚠️ You haven't permission to set roles
UNKNOWN_ERROR: ⚠️ An unknown error occurred, contact the bot owner to fix
USER_IS_ADMIN: ⚠️ User is administrator of the group, use /reload if you think otherwise
USER_NOT_MEMBER: ⚠️ User is not a member of the group
USER_NEVER_BEEN_MEMBER: ⚠️ User has never been in the group
USER_NOT_ADMIN: ⚠️ User is not an administrator of the group
PERM_ACTIVE_BY_DEFAULT: ⚠️ You can't disable this permission beacause it's enabled by default for every group user
MISSING_ADMIN_PERMISSION: ⚠️ You don't have this permission so you can't give it to other users, if you think otherwise use /reload
CANT_CHANGE_YOUR_PERMS: ⚠️ You can't change permissions on yourself
MISSING_RIGHTS: ⚠️ I haven't enough rights to perform this action, if you are trying to promote an user i can't do that if another admin did it first
START_BOT_FIRST: ⚠️ You need to /start me in private chat first to use this command
NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Currently this function is not implemented
CMDDESC_RULES:
/{name}
Send group regulament message, it can be changed in settings
CMDDESC_PERMS:
/{name} or /perms
Show permissions of an user in your group
CMDDESC_STAFF:
/{name} or /staff
Show the list of staffers on group
CMDDESC_INFO:
/{name} or /info
Show info about an user on group
NAME: Name
CONFIRM_FORGOT:
Are you sure to forgot {user} data?
User will be kicked all his tracks will be cleared from your group data on my database, this action is irreversible
SUCCESSFULL_FORGOT:
User forgot successfully!

Please note: if user rejoin the group new data about him will be stored again
Note also that i removed data of this user only from this group data, user data on other groups isn't affected
I didn't cleared any user data from telegram servers!
ADV_REPORT_ISSUE: If you think it is an error please report it to https://github.com/Sp3rick/GroupHelp/issues
